|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR5312A;Atheros, AR5312A-00, GB9599.1B, 3704, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS R4000 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 220 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320ABTC-90G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = ICSI;IC42S16400-7T; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Kendin;KS8995M;Kendin, KS8995M, 0450A4K, GDG0514, 50LWDM; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:12:17, 00:14:BF |oui = 00:12:17, 00:14:BF
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = VxWorks;;;

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, internal,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (9600 8N1),, JP1,, Gemtek type1 pinout |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = linksys-a,linksys-g |defaultssid_regex = ^linksys-a$,,,^linksys-g$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTA-119AG |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/30/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR5112A;Atheros, AR5112A-00, CP0396.00C, 5204, KOREA; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = Atheros;AR2112A;Atheros, AR2112A-00, CP6408.00H, 0519, SINGAPORE; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== WRT55AG v2 serial numbers appear to start with '''MDJ1'''.
"WRTA-119AG_V01", "109-102-4500", and a date code of '''0449''' is silkscreened on one particular WRT55AGv2's board.
{{WiFiCert|W002867|10/15/2004}}
This device may use U-NII-2 channels but does not implement DFS since it predates the FCC requirements.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki's Supported Devices Table] (though, it's unsupported)
==Notes== ===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply included with the device is a ('''Linksys''' branded, model AD 5/2.5C) '''Leader Electronics''' MT15-5050250-A1.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Leader Electronics |model = MT15-5050250-A1 |revision = (Linksys AD 5/2.5C) |input_v=100-120 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=2.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |countrymanuf = China }}
[[Category:English Documentation]]
